title: Im pretty sure that my league is having a memory leak.
body: Hey riot, today I played a few games and after my 3rd game I started frames dropping from around 80 to 6. I've tried looking it up but it all goes to its memory leaking. Is there a fix to this?

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by a memory leak, but any hardware problems should result in the game or pc crashing completely.  Your specific issue might just be due to outdated drivers or bad game files, so go over the steps of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help.  That should assist with tuning up your fps- or patching any holes.  :D
